    • MenuController

      public MenuController()

  • Method Details

    • onPlayButtonClick

      protected void onPlayButtonClick() throws IOException
      onPlayButtonClick method for the play button Stops the menu music. Plays a button sound. takes player names, racketSize, ballSpeed, and finalScore data and passes it to the game controller.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      The initialize method for the menu scene sets the size of the game canvas. starts the menu music.

    • playMenuMusic

      private void playMenuMusic()
      playMenuMusic method to start the menu music.

    • stopMenuTheme

      private void stopMenuTheme()
      stopMenuTheme method to stop the menu music.

    • onExitClick

      protected void onExitClick()
      onExitClick method to exit the game. stops the menu music. plays an exit sound. exits the game.
